capsules_submitted.utterance: So Ron's affiliation is indeed Hogwarts. I'm pretty sure about that one. It's not like he'd be affiliated with anything else, you know? He's a Gryffindor through and through!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm glad to see that Hagrid is still affiliated with Hogwarts. It's a great comfort to know that he's still around, looking out for the students and staff. I've always had a lot of respect for him, you know? He's just so kind and caring, even if he can be a bit intimidating at times.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the typical gender associated with someone who works as a gamekeeper?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Hagrid's character in the Harry Potter series. He's definitely a male character, and I'm quite certain about it. I mean, he's always referred to as 'he' or 'him' in the books and movies. It's not like J.K. Rowling would have made such a big deal out of his gender if it was actually female. Anyway, Hagrid is just one of those characters who exudes masculinity, you know?

Hagrid, he's a great guy. I mean, being half-giant and all, you'd think he'd be intimidating, but he's really just a softie at heart. He cares deeply about the students here at Hogwarts and would do anything to protect them. I've seen him put himself in harm's way time and time again, and it's truly admirable.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. who is the character that casts a spell?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Harry's belongings and I'm pretty sure that he actually has a stealth jacket. I mean, it makes sense given his background as The Boy Who Lived and all the adventures he had with Dumbledore and whatnot. It's not something you'd typically find in a Hogwarts classroom, but it would definitely fit right in with his whole "wizarding spy" vibe.
I'm really glad Harry has a stealth jacket, it's so cool that he can sneak around unnoticed. I mean, who wouldn't want to be able to move undetected? It's like something out of a spy movie.
